channel.title: Whats The Command To IP ban?
channel.description:
What is the code for a IP Ban
Like erm... Normal Ban Is ::banuser (NAME GOES HERE)
Whats Ip Ban?
Is It ::ipbanuser (NAME GOES HEERE) ( Ive tried that on my friends server but it doesnt work - does he have to Make It On His Server? (put something in?)

item.title: Whats The Command To IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @0wn4g3_R4ng3 0wn4g3 R4ng3
item.description:
@0wn4g3_R4ng3 wrote:

The way to IP ban someone is this command. ::ipban (username here)

Read full topic
item.source: Whats The Command To IP ban?

@Blood_Argon wrote:

item.title: Whats The Command To IP ban?
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

Yes, he does, or he can just use the text file (in the data folder) bannedips.text and type the ip of the user you want to ban!

Read full topic
